func:
let randomColor = "#" + Math.floor(Math.random() * 16777215).toString(16);
let encryptedPassword = await bcrypt.hash(msg.oldpayload.password, 10);

msg.payload = {
    "_id": objectid(),
    "deleted": false,
    "avatarColor": randomColor,
    "createdAt": global.get("convert_date"),
    "updatedAt": global.get("convert_date"),
    "roles": [objectid(msg.oldpayload.role)],
    "active": false,
    "firstname": msg.oldpayload.firstname,
    "lastname": msg.oldpayload.lastname,
    "email": msg.oldpayload.email,
    "password": encryptedPassword,
    verifyToken: null,
    resetPassToken: "",
    resetPassExpireToken: null,
    "attributes": msg.oldpayload.attributes === "" ? [] : msg.oldpayload.attributes
}

return msg;

name: create authorizationUrl
function 570
func:
msg.collection = "appSettings";

msg.payload = {    
    email: msg.oldpayload.email,
    googleAppPassword: msg.oldpayload.googleAppPassword,
    authorizationUrl: msg.authorizationUrl,
    deleted: false,
    createdAt: global.get("convert_date"),
    updatedAt: global.get("convert_date"),
    init: true,
    clientId: msg.oldpayload.clientId,
    clientSecret: msg.oldpayload.clientSecret,
    redirectUri: msg.oldpayload.redirectUri
}

return msg;
